item.title: Dark Mode Across Chrome ðŸŒšðŸ˜Ž
item.description: There are lots of extensions out there that turn your web browsing experience much better if you prefer dark backgrounds (who doesn’t right?). My favourite one is Dark Reader but there’s just one problem, mobile versions of chrome don’t support extensions. This trick will help you turn on dark mode everywhere. Steps: Visit Chrome flags by entering chrome://flags/ into the address bar. Search for dark in the flags search bar.
